00001 /*
00002  * Grid.h
00003  * ------
00004  * Ugly hard-coded temperary program to generate a Cartesian grid.
00005  * 1) Read in grid information: nx, ny, nz, depth, dx dy, dz, kx, ky, kz, poro
00006  * 2) Calcualte Transmissibility, and build connection list
00007  */
00008 
00009 #ifndef GRID_H_
00010 #define GRID_H_
00011 
00012 #include "../utl/DataPool.h"
00013 
00014 class Grid {
00015 
00016  public:
00017         Grid(DataPool *dataPool);
00018         virtual ~Grid();
00019 
00020         virtual void prepared()  {}  //calculate grid prperties 
00021         
00022         // --- set the pointer to mDataPool ---
00023         void setDataPool(DataPool *dataPool) { mDataPool = dataPool; }
00024         
00025         // --- getters ---
00026         int getNx() const { return nx; }
00027         int getNy() const { return ny; }
00028         int getNz() const { return nz; }
00029         
00030         virtual int getNAllCells() const=0;
00031         virtual int* getActCellFlag() const { return NULL;}
00032         int getNCells() const { return nCells; }
00033         virtual int getNAllConns() const = 0;
00034         int getNConns() const { return nConns; }
00035         int getBandSize() const { return mBandSize; }
00036         bool containDeadCell() const { return mDeadCell; }
00037 
00038  protected:
00039         int nx, ny, nz;                 // reservoir dimension (nx, ny, nz), 
00040         int nCells, nConns;             // number of cells and connections
00041         double *dx, *dy, *dz, *kx, *ky, *kz, *poro, *depth, *vol, *temp;  // const props of each block
00042         double *ccoordx, *ccoordy, *ccoordz; //centroid coordinates
00043         bool readDepth, readVol, readConn;      // depth, vol, conn has been read in?
00044         DataPool* mDataPool;    // pointer to datapool 
00045         bool readcoord;
00046         int mBandSize;  // bandSize (for band solver)
00047         bool mDeadCell;
00048 };
00049 
00050 #endif
